settings.text: Currently, we are offering FREE standard US domestic ground shipping to addresses in the contiguous US, with the purchase of each of our UNFRAMED Fine Art/Photography Prints. We are also offering FREE standard US domestic ground shipping to addresses in the contiguous US for all FRAMED prints in our SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE, and GALLERY sizes. Our larger-sized STATEMENT & COLLECTOR FRAMED prints have additional shipping requirements due to their size—shipping cost will be calculated at checkout.

At this time we are only taking ONLINE orders to addresses inside of the contiguous US. If you are in Hawaii, Alaska, Canada, or International and would like to place an order, please contact us directly at hello@shopwander.com.

All pieces are custom-printed and framed to order based on your selected size, frame and matting options, just for you. Due to this, we are unable to accept returns or exchanges—All sales are final. We also cannot make any changes or cancellations to your order after 24 hours.
